title: Track fault causing delays between Kranji and Admiralty

title_translations.zh-Hans: Kranji 和 Admiralty 之间的轨道故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Ralat trek menyebabkan kelewatan antara Kranji dan Admiralty
title_translations.ta: Kranji மற்றும் Admiralty இடையே தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் பாதை தவறு

updates.text: Train services on North South line are operating normally now.
Estimate 15 minutes additional traveling time between Kranji and Admiralty on both bounds due to track fault, possibly due to lightning.
